# Calendar.Component.weekOfYear

**Case**

Identifier for the week of the year unit.

## Declaration

```swift
case weekOfYear
```

## Specifying Weeks and Days

- **Calendar.Component.weekOfMonth**: Identifier for the week of the month calendar unit.
- **Calendar.Component.weekday**: Identifier for the weekday unit.
- **Calendar.Component.weekdayOrdinal**: Identifier for the weekday ordinal unit.
- **Calendar.Component.day**: Identifier for the day unit.
